outputs.output_descr: Within the framework of Democratic Governance's focus area 2, this project enhances citizenship of the Afro-Latin American population and strengthens their organizations by means of the systematization of knowledge related to social inclusion. With a view to increase equity and reduce discrimination, it is of great importance to disseminate the contributions of Afro population in Latin America and to create awareness among public opinion on the issue. Dialogue will be fostered to promote inclusive participation of Afro citizens and organizations in Colombia, Ecuador and Panama.

project_descr: Integración Social Comunidades Afrodescendientes en América Latina y el Caribe.
project_title: Proyecto Reg Población Afrodescendiente - América Latina
